text:
vAqyOH pa#kShaqtiH sara#svatOq nipa#kShati-Scaqndrama#sa-stRuqtIyAq nakSha#trANAM catuqrthI sa#viqtuH pa#~jcaqmI ruqdrasya# ShaqShThI saqrpANA(gm)# saptaqmya#ryaqmNO$&ShTaqmI tvaShTu#rnavaqmI dhAqturda#SaqmIndrAqNyA E#kAdaqSyadi#tyai dvAdaqSI dyAvA#pRuthiqvyOH pAqrSvaM ~Myaqmyai# pATUqraH || 54 
(vAqyO - raqShTAvi(gm)#SatiH) (A22)
